name: Firefox Australis Dark Dev-Ed
description:
Re-introduces Australis curved tabs to Firefox Developer Edition theme. Requires Firefox Developer Edition dark theme to be installed and enabled.


This style is an open-source project, available at https://github.com/wilfredwee/australis-dark
additional_info:
This theme requires Dark Compact/Firefox Developer Edition dark theme to be installed and enabled.

If your Firefox version is v53 or higher:
Enable 'Dark Compact' theme by going to Menu (on the top right hand) -> Add-ons -> Appearance -> Enable Compact Dark

If your Firefox version is lower than v53, install this addon:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/devedition-theme-enabler/

Then enable the Developer Edition theme under Menu -> Add-ons -> Appearance.

Then enable this theme in Stylish.

UPDATE 22/04/2017 - New instructions for Firefox v53

UPDATE 24/09/2016 - Support for new Firefox v51. Tested on Ubuntu and Windows 10. OSX and other Windows versions not tested.

UPDATE 22/05/2016: Now OSX and Linux no longer has the bright tab strokes. Making it visually similar to Windows 10.

discussions.name: This is just what the developer theme was missing!
Much better than Mozilla's default dev edition theme
